INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, MEM_NO, BDLIST_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_FILENAME, BOARD_FILESIZE, BOARD_ORIGINALFILENAME) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{bdlistNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardFilename}, #{boardFilesize}, #{boardOriginalfilename})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE #{memId}

SELECT * from ( select rownum AS RNUM, A.* from ( SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_READCOUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, BOARD_FILENAME, (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER M WHERE B.MEM_NO=M.MEM_NO)MEM_NAME FROM BOARD B WHERE BDLIST_NO=#{bdlistNo} AND BOARD_DELFLAG LIKE 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_REGDATE DESC )A )
WHERE RNUM>#{firstRecordIndex} AND RNUM<=#{firstRecordIndex}+ #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BDLIST_NO=#{bdlistNo} AND BOARD_DELFLAG='N'
